name: Spell Spiel
description:
Action-RPG game. Type spells to fend off the monsters surrounding the magic school!

How to Play : 

Spells initally unlocked: Pyroblast, Ice Spike, Life Drain, Protect

Spacebar/Enter: Interact with messages and characters

P: Play/Pause

S: Spells upgrade menu (in pause menu)

C: Credits menu

Q: Quit
